name: Fire Lash
description: You strike out at a target in range with a burning lash,  Make a melee attack on a creature, doing 2d6 + MOVE fire damage.  On a successful attack, the targeted creature must make a CON save against your Move DC.  On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack targeted at the creature for the duration.  This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple Fire Lash saves, up to a maximum of +5.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
